biotools.summary: Adenita is a 3D visualization and modeling toolkit for the in silico design of static and dynamic DNA nanostructures. Based on a multiscale data model, it visualizes DNA-based structures on different abstraction levels and enable users to load and create DNA origami structures and combine them with proteins.
